Flares.help: A quick attack that throws Flares at the target. Little damage, but very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Flares.targetHelp: You are on fire and burning!

Fire_Blast.help: Sends a Blast of Fire at a targeted foe and sets the target on fire for a short period of time. Slower recharge rate than Flares, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Fire_Blast.targetHelp: You are on fire and burning!

Fire_Ball.help: Hurls an exploding Fireball that consumes a targeted foe, and all nearby enemies. Anyone in that explosion is burned and set ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Fire_Ball.targetHelp: You are on fire and burning!

Rain_of_Fire.help: Summons a Rain of Fire over a targeted location, burning foes and reducing their movement speed within a large area. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
Rain_of_Fire.targetHelp: You are on fire and burning!

Fire_Breath.help: You can breathe forth a torrent of fire that burns all foes within its narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Fire_Breath.targetHelp: You are on fire and burning!

Aim.help: Greatly increases your chance to hit with attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: You take a moment to concentrate and are much more accurate for a short while.

Blaze.help: A devastating flame attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Blaze.targetHelp: You are on fire and burning!

Blazing_Bolt.help: A long range beam of fire that blasts your foes. Like most sniper attacks, this power has a bonus to Accuracy, but is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Blazing_Bolt.targetHelp: You are on fire and burning!

Inferno.help: Unleashes a massive fiery explosion to devastate all nearby enemies and set them ablaze. Inferno deals Extreme Fire damage to all nearby foes and inflicts Moderate Fire damage over time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Inferno.shortHelp: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Fire/Smash), Foe Moderate DoT(Fire)
Inferno.targetHelp: You are on fire and burning!
